subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Sharapova trailed Maria Kirilenko, whom she has known since they were 12, 4-2 in the first set, but she won the next 10 games to advance with ease, 6-4, 6-0.
snippet: Sharapova trailed Maria Kirilenko, whom she has known since they were 12, 4-2 in the first set, but she won the next 10 games to advance with ease, 6-4, 6-0.
